title: Can´t find that font! :/
content:
I got this a part of a Logo and i can´t find the fitting font. Tried all of the automated ones.  
Anyone can help me out  
Closed match for me is Appareo family

Font: 

 Artistamp (Medium) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124054/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [planlos\_neuc.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124054/http:/typophile.com/files/planlos_neuc.jpg) | 114.01 KB |
author: Schrulli

comments.content:
Your font is **[Artistamp (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124054/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=HaroldsFonts%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Artistamp%20-%20Medium&fid=545a412172f3ffb90796e346438e7c04&fsize=60&text=Planlos&fit=1)** by Harolds Fonts. The text set is "Planlos" and if you embolden it a bit it will match your sample better (smaller white spots).  
PS: You probably haven't tried all automated ones, you should also try [www.FindmyFont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317124054/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "www.FindmyFont.com") ;)

fvilanakis i HONESTLY love you! :D  
It took me so long to find that font, and you got it in minutes! Thank you for your efforts!
